description.creategoggles.goggle_unit: Grants advanced information about create contraptions
item.creategoggles.chainmail_backtank.to: Provides _Pressurized_ _Air_ to Equipment that requires it.
_Collects_ _Pressurized_ _Air_ at a rate depending on the Rotational Speed.
A _Wearable_ _Tank_ for carrying Pressurized Air that is plated with armor to protect the wearer.
item.creategoggles.diamond_backtank.tool: Provides _Pressurized_ _Air_ to Equipment that requires it.
_Collects_ _Pressurized_ _Air_ at a rate depending on the Rotational Speed.
A _Wearable_ _Tank_ for carrying Pressurized Air that is plated with armor to protect the wearer.
item.creategoggles.goggle_chainmail_helm: Shows _colored indicators_ corresponding to the _Speed Level_ of a placed kinetic component as well as _Stress Impact_ and _Capacity_ of individual components.
Shows detailed information about _Speed_ or _Stress_ of the network to which the gauge is connected.
Shows detailed information about the _Capacity_ of the block and any _Fluids_ stored within.
A helmet with a pair of glasses to augment your vision with useful _kinetic information_.
